job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on supporting and improving AI systems rather than developing them from scratch. While it involves interacting with AI, the core tasks are about analyzing escalated tickets, providing feedback for AI improvement, and integrating human expertise with AI for customer support. This aligns more with using AI tools to enhance productivity and support existing systems, rather than core AI development or engineering roles like ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. The emphasis is on 'application support' and 'customer resolutions' using AI, not on building or deeply engineering AI models or systems.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding customer issues and how AI systems are used to resolve them, aiming to improve customer support which is a business function.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions' directly relates to adapting or improving existing AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies', which can be considered a form of software development in the context of integrating new AI capabilities.
job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

job_tasks.justification: The task of 'improving the AI system' based on analysis of tickets and feedback suggests a role in maintaining and enhancing the operational AI systems.

soft_skills.phrase: taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
